name: The Bloodstained Crown of Darkness
data: It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence a bit.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'asphyxiation preference'.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'poison preference'.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'poison fend'.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'venom fend'.
